artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,428); at left are a belt buckle and watch face in black and white; in the center are two women shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; on the right a man in dark brown breeches, socks, shoes, and vest, with a blue and white striped coat, holding a brown hat with blue trim, and a walking stick
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Vingt-huitième Cahier, 11 Septembre 1789
